Whenever another creature you control dies, create a Faith token attached to Aspiring Martyr. [i](It’s an Aura with “Enchanted creature gets +1/+1” and “When enchanted creature dies, create a tapped 1/1 white Human creature token.” )[/i]
Sacrifice Aspiring Martyr: It deals damage equal to its power to target player and you gain that much life. Activate only as a sorcery.
